description.translate: Time doesn't make you decadent, but it will make you nostalgic.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Lame de l'ancien\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Le temps ne fais pas ta décadence,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7mais il te rendra nostalgique.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Time doesn't make you decadent,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7but it will make you nostalgic.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7HAS§a2 §7SPD§c-1\"}"]}}
